title: AHUS antibiotics list — ab_ahus
text: dataset contains information antibiotics AHUS. details follow.

title: AHUS antibiotics list — ab_ahus
text: Antibiotic Name antibiotic Category Access, watch reserve Norsk_AHUS Norwegian name, AHUS hospital system color_code Color code according category

title: AHUS antibiotics list — ab_ahus
code: head(ab_ahus) #>                    Antibiotic Category                Norsk_AHUS color_code #> 1                 Amoxicillin   Access              Amoksicillin      green #> 2 Amoxicillin/clavulanic-acid   Access Amoksicillin/Klavulansyre      green #> 3                  Ampicillin   Access                Ampicillin      green #> 4                Azithromycin    Watch               Azitromycin     yellow #> 5                   Aztreonam  Reserve                 Aztreonam        red #> 6            Benzylpenicillin   Access          Benzylpenicillin      green

title: WHO antibiotics list — ab_who
text: dataset contains information antibiotics . details follow.

title: WHO antibiotics list — ab_who
text: Antibiotic Name antibiotic Class Antibiotic class ATC code ATC code Category Access, watch reserve Listed EML/EMLc 2023 Whether listed color_code Color code according category

title: WHO antibiotics list — ab_who
code: head(ab_who) #>                    Antibiotic                                Class ATC code #> 1                    Amikacin                      Aminoglycosides  J01GB06 #> 2                 Amoxicillin                          Penicillins  J01CA04 #> 3 Amoxicillin/clavulanic-acid Beta-lactam/beta-lactamase-inhibitor  J01CR02 #> 4                  Ampicillin                          Penicillins J01CA01  #> 5        Ampicillin/sulbactam Beta-lactam/beta-lactamase-inhibitor  J01CR01 #> 6                   Arbekacin                      Aminoglycosides  J01GB12 #>   Category Listed on EML/EMLc 2023 color_code #> 1   Access                     Yes      green #> 2   Access                     Yes      green #> 3   Access                     Yes      green #> 4   Access                     Yes      green #> 5   Access                      No      green #> 6    Watch                      No     yellow
